title: Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 408 of 2020)), hereby
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Residential Tenancies (Amendment) Act
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Residential Tenancies (Amendment) Act 

2015 (Section 63(a))(Commencement) Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited residential tenancy (amendment) act 2015 (section 63(a))(commencement) order 2023

title: Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 408 of 2020)), hereby
heading: 2. The 15th day of March 2023 is appointed as the day on which
text_raw:
2. The 15th day of March 2023 is appointed as the day on which 
paragraph (a) of section 63 of the Residential Tenancies (Amendment) Act 
2015 (No. 42 of 2015) shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

7 March, 2023. 

DARRAGH O’BRIEN, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 10th March, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [96] 3

title: Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 408 of 2020)), hereby
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

The purpose of this commencement order is to bring into operation on 15 
March 2023 section 63(a) of the Residential Tenancies (Amendment) Act 2015 
(No. 42 of 2015) to technically amend section 139(1) of the Residential 
Tenancies Act 2004 (No. 27 of 2004). 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [96]
